# moveItem(at:to:)

**Instance Method**

Moves an item from one index to another in the scrubber.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func moveItem(at oldIndex: Int, to newIndex: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **oldIndex**: The index of the item that you want to move.
- **newIndex**: The index of the itemâ€™s new location.

## Inserting, moving, and deleting items

- **insertItems(at:)**: Inserts new items at the specified indexes into the scrubber.
- **removeItems(at:)**: Removes the items at the specified indexes from the scrubber.
